name: Flowerzzz
description:
Flowerzzz is a game developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022. It's my first Game Jam and my first finished game project that I release.

-----

How to play: You control bees, and your goal is to gain points by collecting flowers. Every time you collect enough flowers, a new bee will join your team. Combine multiple bees to collect big flowers quicker or dispatch your swarm to collect multiple flowers at the same time.

But be careful, a danger might come. Keep an eye on the sky!
